TextView.android:text: Located in the most scenic part of the 'French Quarter’, The Promenade is a grand beachside hotel in India’s most beautiful and romantic towns, Pondicherry. Colonial villas, leafy parks, the rock beach, and attractive cafes surround the hotel on all sides. The hotel offers gorgeous custom-designed rooms that overlook the azure sea and is by the town’s ancient lighthouse. The hotel has 3 categories of rooms - Deluxe Sea Facing Rooms, Deluxe Non-Sea Facing Rooms and Suites - all are modern, air-conditioned rooms, and defined by the serene and soothing decor, offering maximum comfort. The Promenade offers some of the best-known dining, lounging, and nightlife experiences in Pondicherry. Bay of Buddha, overlooking the lighthouse is a splendid rooftop restaurant serving pan-Asian delicacies. The Blueline, a casual dining space specializes in a wide range of authentic French, Continental, Indian, and Mediterranean dishes. Risqué, the exotic leather lounge bar overlooking the pool offers a fine selection of international wines, mocktails, and exclusive blends of coffee, and thin-crust stone oven pizzas. The Storyteller's Bar is a uniquely conceptualized bar that reveals nuanced stories of the city’s history, culture, and soul. The bar has proven to be the best nightlife spot in Pondicherry hosting the great national and international musicians, DJs & entertainers. The hotel also has the Le Pondichéry store, an ode to the slow but cosmopolitan life of the small coastal town. It is a tribute to the diverse influences that make this town special and highlights the talent of local craftsmen and thoughtful small brands. Our top-notch facilities and services make your getaway to Pondicherry a delightful one. The Promenade has a unique Balinese themed lounge pool. The massages with natural essential compounds at Serena Spa make it the perfect place to relax and rejuvenate your senses. We also have a dedicated front office team that will help you plan your time in the city - whether you wish to explore Pondicherry or seek experiences in the sea. Other facilities include Wi-Fi access, laundry service, travel assistance, and doctor on call. Experience the grandeur and joy of living by the sea in India's French Riviera.

Pondicherry is home to a gamut of experiences exclusive only to this beachside paradise. We have taken the essence of Pondicherry and instilled it in our hotel to cater to every need of our guests. From the delectable cuisine we serve to the luxury facilities we provide, we want our guests to find their experience synonymous with Pondicherry’s rich history, legacy and natural beauty. Here at the Grand Hotel D’Europe, we make the wellbeing of our guests a priority. We are equipped with the best of facilities to ensure that you find your stay with us absolutely pleasant.
